----- Original Message ----- 
From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, August 12, 2000 9:09 PM
Subject: A New Arrival


*****RebelYell****

   A stasis pod streaked through the atmosphere
towards the wastes of Siberia. It hit the ground and
skidded for several hundred feet before it finally
came to a halt. The pods DNA scanner launched to find
an appropriate life form. "DNA Sequencing complete" it
said after several minutes. Suddenly the pod opened
and a Russian black bear emerged. The bear sniffed the
air and surveyed the area for a moment. "RebelYell,
Maximize!" Suddenly the bear transformed into a sleek
black robot."Sweet" RebelYell said as he looked over
his new form. Soon his mind turned to more important
matters: finding out if there were more Maximals
nearby and finding out where he was and why he was there.
